resources.string: You can change application language from here!
You can change application theme from here!
You can change shop info from here!
You can rate us from here!
You can see our other app here!

Welcome to Shop Yar ! Efficiently manage your online shop with our program. It simplifies inventory management, creates sales invoices, and maintains lists effortlessly. Say hello to streamlined operations.
Please fill in your shop information and select an image for your shop.\n Your shop information is included in your invoices, and you can change your information from your profile page.
